sourcesContent:
export const personas = {
  maya_associate: {
    id: 'maya_associate',
    name: 'Maya Chen',
    title: 'Young Associate',
    age: 27,
    image: '/Maya_Chen.png',
    description: '2nd-year associate',
    quote: "I need briefs that persuade judges.",
    needs: 'Quick feedback, mobile learning, real examples',
    designPriority: 'practical_application',
    contentApproach: 'scenario_based',
    alexQuestion: 'How will you balance rigor with accessibility?'
  },
  
  robert_partner: {
    id: 'robert_partner',
    name: 'Robert Martinez',
    title: 'Senior Partner',
    age: 42,
    image: '/Robert_Martinez.png',
    description: '15-year litigation partner',
    quote: "Show me results. Make my team write better.",
    needs: 'Proven methods, time efficient, clear ROI',
    designPriority: 'efficiency_roi',
    contentApproach: 'expert_led',
    alexQuestion: 'What metrics will prove ROI to partners?'
  },
  
  patricia_judge: {
    id: 'patricia_judge',
    name: 'Patricia Williams',
    title: 'Federal Judge',
    age: 58,
    image: '/Patricia_Williams.png',
    description: 'Federal district judge',
    quote: "Lawyers must write clearly. Lives depend on it.",
    needs: 'High standards, professional rigor, quality focus',
    designPriority: 'professional_rigor',
    contentApproach: 'standards_based',
    alexQuestion: 'How will you modernize without losing standards?'
  }
};
